scripts.postbuild: rm -rf ./build_release && mv build ./build_release/ && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/game/constant.js -- ./build_release/game/constant.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/game/game.js -- ./build_release/game/game.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/game/gameScene.js -- ./build_release/game/gameScene.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/game/keyboard.js -- ./build_release/game/keyboard.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/game/wizSprite.js -- ./build_release/game/wizSprite.js && cat ./build_release/game/constant.js >> ./build_release/game/wiz_lib.js && cat ./build_release/game/game.js >> ./build_release/game/wiz_lib.js && cat ./build_release/game/gameScene.js >> ./build_release/game/wiz_lib.js && cat ./build_release/game/keyboard.js >> ./build_release/game/wiz_lib.js && cat ./build_release/game/wizSprite.js >> ./build_release/game/wiz_lib.js && terser --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/babylon/babylonConstant.js -- ./build_release/babylon/babylonConstant.js && terser --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/babylon/babylonApis.js -- ./build_release/babylon/babylonApis.js && terser --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/babylon/babylonGame.js -- ./build_release/babylon/babylonGame.js && terser --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/babylon/babylonScene.js -- ./build_release/babylon/babylonScene.js && terser --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/babylon/babylonGameObject.js -- ./build_release/Babylon/babylonGameObject.js && terser --compress --mangle --output ./build_release/babylon/babylonSound.js -- ./build_release/babylon/babylonSound.js && cat ./build_release/babylon/babylonConstant.js >> ./build_release/babylon/wiz_lib_3d.js && cat ./build_release/babylon/babylonApis.js >> ./build_release/babylon/wiz_lib_3d.js && cat ./build_release/babylon/babylonGame.js >> ./build_release/babylon/wiz_lib_3d.js && cat ./build_release/babylon/babylonScene.js >> ./build_release/babylon/wiz_lib_3d.js && cat ./build_release/babylon/babylonGameObject.js >> ./build_release/babylon/wiz_lib_3d.js && cat ./build_release/babylon/babylonSound.js >> ./build_release/babylon/wiz_lib_3d.js
